text:
I am in favour of replacing the argument standardize by normalize which would be one of `{'psc', 'std', None}` for the scaling of the raw time-series.
`'psc'`: percent signal change to force temporal mean within each ROI to 100.
`'std'`: standardized to force temporal standard deviation of each ROI to 1.
`None`: no scaling at all

But may be it is annoying to change the type and name of a parameter ?
title: [discussion]: PSC unit in NiftiMapsMasker
